statements: SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT loan_id, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate < 5;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE amount < 5000 AND interest_rate > 3;
SELECT loan_id, amount FROM Loans ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms = 'monthly' ORDER BY loan_id ASC
SELECT loan_id, amount, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 2.5 AND 5.0
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE amount < 5000 AND repayment_terms LIKE '%yearly%'
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate >= 3.0 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY loan_id DESC;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms = 'monthly' ORDER BY interest_rate ASC;
SELECT loan_id, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Loans ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, amount, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 3.0 AND 6.0 ORDER BY loan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC
SELECT loan_id, amount FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms = 'Monthly'
SELECT loan_id, repayment_terms, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms IN ('Weekly', 'Bi-weekly') ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate > 5
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, amount, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 123;
SELECT name, address FROM Borrowers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Loans;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC, loan_id ASC;
SELECT borrower_id, name FROM Borrowers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY borrower_id ASC;
SELECT loan_id, amount, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms IN ('weekly', 'monthly') AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY amount ASC, loan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payment FROM Payments GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_payment > 1000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC, borrower_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT lender_id, name, email FROM Lenders WHERE lender_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, Loans.amount, Transactions.amount AS transaction_amount FROM Transactions INNER JOIN Loans ON Transactions.loan_id = Loans.loan_id WHERE Loans.interest_rate > 0.1;

SELECT Lenders.name AS lender_name, Borrowers.name AS borrower_name, Transactions.amount FROM Lenders INNER JOIN Transactions ON Lenders.lender_id = Transactions.lender_id INNER JOIN Borrowers ON Transactions.borrower_id = Borrowers.borrower_id WHERE Transactions.amount > 5000 ORDER BY Transactions.amount DESC;

SELECT Loans.loan_id, Loans.amount, Lenders.name AS lender_name, Borrowers.name AS borrower_name, Transactions.transaction_date FROM Loans INNER JOIN Transactions ON Loans.loan_id = Transactions.loan_id INNER JOIN Lenders ON Transactions.lender_id = Lenders.lender_id INNER JOIN Borrowers ON Transactions.borrower_id = Borrowers.borrower_id WHERE Transactions.transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Loans.amount ASC, Transactions.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, Lenders.name AS lender_name, Borrowers.name AS borrower_name, Transactions.amount, Transactions.transaction_date FROM Transactions INNER JOIN Lenders ON Transactions.lender_id = Lenders.lender_id INNER JOIN Borrowers ON Transactions.borrower_id = Borrowers.borrower_id WHERE Lenders.email != Borrowers.email ORDER BY Transactions.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 100;
SELECT amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate >= 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT loan_id, repayment_terms FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM Loans ORDER BY interest_rate DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY repayment_terms DESC;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate < 0.05;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE repayment_terms LIKE '%monthly%' AND amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate, repayment_terms FROM Loans ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) AS average_interest FROM Loans WHERE amount > 3000;
